alternatives.transcript: Hi, I'm John. And I'm Duck. We're the co founders of HyperNote, an AI notepad for private meetings running fully on device. To start recording a new meeting, simply create a new note and press the red record button. You'll see voices coming through the mic and system audio, and transcriptions will start appearing in the right panel. During the meeting, only jot down important key points, just like you see in the current note. Don't worry about any other details. HyperNote is listening. Yeah. When you stop recording, wait a few seconds and you'll see an enhanced summary appear in the note editor. Our local LLM combines the transcript and your rough notes to create a clear comprehensive summary, all without using WiFi or any third party API. That's it. It's that simple. While simple note taking is our core feature, we also offer powerful tools like AI chat, templates, and custom configurations, so feel free to explore. If you'd like to learn more, check out our docs or join our Discord. We'd love to hear from you. Thanks, and enjoy using HyperNote.

sentences.text: We're the co founders of HyperNote, an AI notepad for private meetings running fully on device.
To start recording a new meeting, simply create a new note and press the red record button.
the mic and system audio, and transcriptions will start appearing in the right panel.
During the meeting, only jot down important key points, just like you see in the current note.
Don't worry about any other details.
When you stop recording, wait a few seconds and you'll see an enhanced summary appear in the note editor.
Our local LLM combines the transcript and your rough notes to create a clear comprehensive summary, all without using WiFi or any third party API.
is our core feature, we also offer powerful tools like AI chat, templates, and custom configurations, so feel free to explore.
If you'd like to learn more, check out our docs or join our Discord.
We'd love to hear from you.

utterances.transcript: Hi, I'm John. And I'm Duck. We're the co founders of HyperNote, an AI notepad for private meetings running fully on device.
To start recording a new meeting, simply create a new note and press the red record button.

You'll see voices coming through the mic and system audio, and transcriptions will start appearing in the right panel. During the meeting, only jot down important key points, just like you see in the current note.
Don't worry about any other details. HyperNote is listening. Yeah. When you stop recording, wait a few seconds and you'll see an enhanced summary appear in the note editor.
Our local LLM combines the transcript and your rough notes to create a clear comprehensive summary, all without using WiFi or any third party API.
While simple note taking is our core feature, we also offer powerful tools like AI chat, templates,
If you'd like to learn more, check out our docs or join our Discord.
We'd love to hear from you. Thanks, and enjoy using HyperNote.
